records.location_details: On 1 July, a rubber boat with approximately 40 migrants onboard was detected by the Hellenic Coast Guard (HCG) at the sea area of Samos Island inside Turkish territorial waters. The Turkish Coast Guard (TCG) patrol boats tried to escort the boat towards Hellenic territorial waters. JRCC Piraeus informed MRCC Ankara three times, and eventually two TCG patrol boats took over responsibility. HCG maritime assets remained close to the border line inside Hellenic territorial waters.
